agents.name: Emma Chen
agents.description: A young librarian who recently moved to town. She's curious about local history and enjoys helping others find information.
agents.background: Emma grew up in the city but always dreamed of small-town life. She has a degree in library science and a passion for uncovering stories.

agents.name: Marcus Rodriguez
agents.description: The town's mechanic and volunteer firefighter. He's lived here his whole life and knows everyone's business.
agents.background: Marcus inherited the garage from his father and takes pride in keeping the town running. He's unmarried but deeply committed to his community.

agents.name: Dr. Sarah Williams
agents.description: The town's only doctor, who runs a small clinic. She's overworked but dedicated to her patients.
agents.background: Sarah came to town five years ago to pay off medical school loans but stayed because she fell in love with the community.

agents.name: Old Pete
agents.description: A retired fisherman who spends his days at the diner telling stories. He's the unofficial town historian.
agents.background: Pete has lived in town for 70 years and remembers when things were 'simpler.' He's a repository of local knowledge and gossip.

locations.name: Library
locations.description: A cozy small-town library with tall windows and comfortable reading nooks. The local history section is particularly well-maintained.

locations.name: Garage
locations.description: Marcus's auto repair shop, filled with the smell of motor oil and the sound of tools. A gathering place for local men.

locations.name: Medical Clinic
locations.description: A small but well-equipped medical facility. Dr. Williams sees patients here and handles minor emergencies.

locations.name: Diner
locations.description: The town's social hub, serving coffee and comfort food. The walls are covered with local photos and memorabilia.

locations.name: Town Square
locations.description: The heart of the town, featuring a small park with benches and a gazebo. Community events are often held here.

locations.name: Main Street
locations.description: The town's main commercial strip, lined with small shops and businesses. Most foot traffic passes through here.
